alert.note: Alert for Flathead, Mission Valleys; Lower Clark Fork Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Freezing Fog Advisory issued January 13 at 8:53AM MST until January 13 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...FREEZING FOG ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST TODAY... * WHAT...Visibility of one half mile or less ice formation on roads in freezing fog. * WHERE...Flathead Lake, Flathead Valley, Mission Valley, Polson, Evaro Hill, Highway 200 Thompson Falls to Plains, Highway 200 Trout Creek to Heron, and I-90 Lookout Pass to Haugan. * WHEN...Until noon MST today. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility and potential frost or ice formation on roadways.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. Also, be alert for frost on bridge decks causing slippery roads.

area.areaDesc: Flathead, Mission Valleys; Lower Clark Fork Region
